mean_cn: n. 讣告；  adj. 关于死者的，讣告的
mean_en: an article in a newspaper about the life of someone who has died recently
word_etyma: obitu离开（死亡的委婉语）+ ary相关的 → obituary 讣告
short_phrase: read an obituary in the newspaper
sentence: Reading Michael Jackson's obituary in the newspaper brought a tear to my eye
sentence_trans: 我在报纸上看到了迈克尔·杰克逊的讣告，这让我伤心落泪。
